title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Six Legs and Four Central Drawers, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Six Legs and Four Central Drawers
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at top of sheet: 5.' 0," and throughout: [illegible and partly cut-off inscriptions]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Sideboard with rounded corners on six straight tapering legs has and flat central front section containing  four drawers - two smaller drawers side-by-side over two larger drawers atop each other; "C"-shaped handles and keyholes on each drawer; a door decorated with patera medallion design on either side of center front; floral decorations on four of legs; backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Six Legs and Four Central Drawers, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-12
